description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for assessments API endpoints, including listing assessments, retrieving by ID, submitting answers, and fetching results. It imports the assessmentsController for handling business logic.

methods.name: router.get('/assessments/list')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all assessments.

methods.name: router.get('/assessments/:id')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve an assessment by ID.

methods.name: router.post('/assessments')
methods.description: Handles POST requests to submit assessment answers.

methods.name: router.get('/assessments/results')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to fetch latest assessment results for a candidate.
